raw_body: SALLAY – GNEI RUHINA,​ beloved wife of late T.S. Sallay (Tony – Ex Petty Officer,​ SLN,​ loving mother of Jean Handagama (Formerly of Wycherly Intnl.) and late Roshini Silva (Australia),​ M.i.L. of Ravi Handagama and Shane Silva,​ sister of Aniff Ahamed,​ late Selwyn,​ Mervyn,​ late Commander Suraj (Bunny – SLN),​ Ronny & Farina Dole. S.i.L. of Thajudeen Sallay,​ Tuany (Ex-SLN) + Jurathy Sallay,​ Ruvini & Staby,​ late Binky Ahamed,​ late Framy,​ Roja,​ Rehanie,​ Feroza and Anver Dole,​ passed away peacefully on 18th of October,​ 2023. Janaza took place on same day at Dehiwela Jumma Mosque.069872
